name: todoist_scrape_today
description: Scrape today's tasks from Todoist. Requires login.

steps.code: const tasks = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.task_list_item, [data-testid="task"]')).slice(0,50).map(el => { const title = el.querySelector('.task_content, [data-testid="task-name"]')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const project = el.querySelector('[class*="project"], .project_link')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const priority = el.querySelector('[class*="priority"]')?.className?.match(/priority_(\d)/)?.[1]||''; return { title, project, priority }; }).filter(t=>t.title); return { view: 'Today', tasks }
steps.name: page_data
steps.label: Extract data
